title: Feet together in sujood? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: is from the UK when performing Salah and you're in the sud position uh do you have to stick both of your legs together or can you separate them it is part of the Sunnah to join your feet together while in the prostration position in your sujud but if you separate them this Salah is valid because what is mandatory is to place seven limbs on the ground the feet the knees the hands and the forehead in addition to the nose if you do this your prayer is valid but the Sunnah is as per the Hadith of mother that to uh uh join and combine both feets while in the suud
